# [Interview #974: AMOL Signing Report - J. Dauro, Entry #40](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=974#40)

#### Question

Are there going to be any more Mistborn books?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes, there will. In 2014 there will be a sequel to
*Alloy of Law*
.
